app_name: 掌上高考-志愿填报指导平台
description:
掌上高考是中国教育在线旗下产品，国内较权威的高考智能志愿填报APP，志愿填报领域的佼佼者，借助人工智能+大数据的力量成功帮助千万用户填报志愿。掌上高考的招录数据，全面丰富，更新及时，现已适配高考志愿填报政策，能够为考生提供有效的志愿模拟填报数据。

1.专业测评 科学认知
通过多维测试，为考生推荐出与性格及兴趣相匹配的专业方向，面对1500余个大学专业不再迷茫。

2.大学专业 深度解析
近百位知名教授深度解析高校热门专业，助力考生掌握专业内涵，知晓就业前景。

3.高校信息 免费查询
聚合2800余所高校信息，历年大学录取数据全面开放。

4.升学途径 全面掌握
重点高校招生负责人视频解读自主招生、艺考等各类招生政策，给与考生升学指导！

使用掌上高考，报考大学、升学规划、兴趣测评、一对一志愿咨询、艺考招生等升学路径e网通， 一个APP就能了解相关资讯。高考数学，高考语文，高考英语成绩不够理想，掌上高考也能帮助你一键生成较理想、较优志愿表，成为考生高考常用的掌上高考志愿填报神器，科学报志愿，珍惜每一分！

Ready to Speak English Confidently? 

Welcome to Learna AI English Tutor App, your all-in-one solution for mastering the English language! Learn English with grammar, speaking, reading, pronunciation, and vocabulary practices designed to enhance your proficiency in every aspect of the language.

With Learna AI, you can speak English confidently and effectively through interactive conversations. Our app takes your language learning journey beyond traditional methods. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Learna AI is here to help you learn & speak English in a fun, engaging, and personalized way.

English practices and lessons are guided by our Learna AI Virtual Chat Character, offering tailored support as you learn. You can speak with the AI character to improve both your speaking and listening skills. The app provides real-time feedback, helping you speak correctly and refine your vocabulary as you go. This makes learning English more dynamic, interactive, and efficient, as you can practice speaking at your own pace.

Learna AI also focuses on improving your grammar skills. You’ll learn essential grammar rules and practice them through a variety of exercises that help reinforce your understanding. The grammar practices are designed to gradually improve your proficiency, allowing you to speak with accuracy and clarity. As you learn grammar, you will build a stronger foundation for your speaking and writing skills.

Vocabulary plays a critical role in speaking English fluently. With Learna AI, you can improve your vocabulary by learning new words and phrases that are practical and useful in daily conversations. Each lesson focuses on building your vocabulary, ensuring you have a broad range of words at your disposal. The app features vocabulary practice that adapts to your level, helping you speak more naturally and confidently.

Your pronunciation also gets a boost with Learna AI. As you speak, you’ll receive valuable feedback to improve your pronunciation. The app includes exercises specifically designed to help you master English pronunciation and speak clearly. Pronunciation practices allow you to correct mistakes and sound more authentic when speaking English.

Track your progress with detailed performance metrics and milestones. Set learning goals to monitor your achievements and celebrate your successes. With continuous practice, you’ll see your speaking skills improve, and your vocabulary will expand. By setting specific goals, you ensure that each practice session is focused and effective.

Learna AI Language Tutor Features:

English Conversation Practice with Learna AI Virtual Chat Character
Get feedback from Learna AI for your mistakes
Learn English Grammar with tailored lessons
Improve your English Reading Skills
Enrich your English Vocabulary with daily vocabulary practices & Learn new words 
Spelling Check and vocabulary reinforcement
Perfect your English Pronunciation through interactive exercises
Enhance your English Speaking Skills through practical speaking practice
Track your progress and set goals to continually improve
Speak, practice, and learn today with Learna AI, your partner in mastering the English language!

BetterSpeak: Your AI Tutor for Language Speaking
Do you want to speak English more fluently, confidently, and naturally? BetterSpeak is your personal AI English tutor designed to help you practice speaking through lifelike conversations, real-time corrections, and personalized feedback. 

Whether you’re preparing for exams, traveling abroad, attending meetings, or simply aiming to sound more natural, BetterSpeak turns your smartphone into your personal speaking coach.

- Smarter Than a Textbook – Your AI Language Tutor
Unlike traditional apps that only teach vocabulary and grammar, BetterSpeak puts speaking first. You’ll talk with an AI tutor that understands your strengths, identifies your weak points, and adapts lessons to your learning style and goals.

- Practice English with a Lifelike Avatar Tutor
Have face-to-face speaking practice with a friendly, expressive AI tutor. This animated coach helps you stay motivated while correcting your pronunciation, grammar, and sentence structure in real time—just like a real tutor would.

- Real-Life Speaking Practice Without the Fear
Feel shy or unsure about your English? BetterSpeak creates a safe and supportive space to practice real-life conversations—from job interviews to airport dialogues or casual small talk—without fear of judgment.

- Progress You Can See and Feel
Track your growth over time with detailed reports on pronunciation clarity, fluency, grammar accuracy, and vocabulary usage. Watch your confidence grow as your English improves session by session.

- A Personalized Program That Fits You
No more generic lessons. BetterSpeak builds a custom speaking journey tailored to your level and needs—whether you're a beginner or intermediate learner. Focus on the skills that matter most to you.

- Multilingual Support for Beginners
Just starting out? You can learn and practice English even if your native language is Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish, Italian, German, or French. Your AI tutor supports you in your own language while guiding you toward fluent English.

- Real-Time Corrections & Instant Feedback
BetterSpeak doesn’t just listen—it responds. You’ll receive instant, constructive feedback on your grammar, vocabulary usage, pronunciation, and fluency, helping you adjust and improve on the spot.

- Motivating & Gamified Learning
Set daily speaking goals, earn badges, collect points, and build streaks that keep you engaged. BetterSpeak turns language learning into a habit—and a fun one.

- Built for Real People with Real Goals
From passing the IELTS or TOEFL to improving business communication or daily conversation skills, BetterSpeak is your intelligent, always-available tutor for practical speaking success.

- Download BetterSpeak Today
Join thousands of learners who are unlocking their English speaking potential with BetterSpeak. Say goodbye to hesitation, and hello to confident, clear communication.



We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or feedback to make BetterSpeak better, we'd love to hear from you. Don't hesitate to contact us at support@betterspeak.com

This application allows you to learn regular and irregular french verbs.
It contains the most common french verbs (2,000+ and adding more).
It shows the conjugation of verbs in different tenses: Conditionnel, Subjonctif, Imparfait, Passé composé and others.

Features:
- Tenses: 
    Indicatif (Indicatif Présent, Indicatif Passé Composé, Indicatif Imparfait, Indicatif Plus-que-parfait, Indicatif Passé Simple, Indicatif Passé Antérieur, Indicatif Futur simple, Indicatif Futur Antérieur), 
    Conditionnel (Conditionnel Présent, Conditionnel Passé), 
    Subjonctif (Subjonctif Présent, Subjonctif Passé, Subjonctif Imparfait, Subjonctif Plus-que-parfait), 
    Imparfait (Imparfait Présent, Imparfait Passé), 
    Infinitif (Infinitif Présent, Infinitif Passé), 
    Participe (Participe Présent, Participe Passé), 
    Gérondif (Gérondif Présent, Gérondif Passé).
- Examples, definitions, pronunciation and notifications.
- Verb translations for: English, Spanish and Portuguese.
- Text for: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Russian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional and Arabic.
- Sort by: group (1st, 2nd or 3rd) or most common (top 25, top 50, top 100, top 300). 
- Quick Search.

Histoires de Prophètes : Plongée dans les Récits Sacrés de l’Islam
Plongez dans les récits inspirants des prophètes tels que relatés dans l’œuvre Qasas al-Anbiya d’Ibn Kathir. Cette application offre une exploration détaillée de chaque prophète, mettant en évidence leurs miracles et leurs messages essentiels pour enrichir votre compréhension spirituelle.

99 Noms d’Allah
Approfondissez votre foi à travers une section dédiée aux _99 Noms d’Allah_. Chaque nom est expliqué avec soin, vous aidant à saisir les attributs divins et à vous rapprocher de votre Créateur.

Heures de Prière et Direction de la Qibla
Restez en phase avec vos obligations religieuses grâce à l’affichage des horaires de prière selon votre localisation. Vous avez également la possibilité de déterminer avec précision la direction de la Qibla pour accomplir vos prières où que vous soyez.

Suivi et Progression
Reprenez votre lecture sans effort grâce à la fonction de sauvegarde automatique. Une barre de progression vous indique votre avancement dans chaque histoire, permettant ainsi une lecture fluide et continue.

Marque-pages et Favoris
Conservez facilement les passages qui vous marquent en ajoutant des marque-pages. De plus, vous pouvez enregistrer vos récits favoris dans une section dédiée afin de les retrouver rapidement.

Personnalisation de l’Apparence
Choisissez entre un mode clair ou sombre pour adapter votre expérience de lecture à votre environnement et à vos préférences personnelles, assurant ainsi un confort optimal.

Interface PageView
Bénéficiez d’une navigation fluide grâce à l’interface _PageView_, qui vous permet de parcourir les histoires page par page et de vous immerger pleinement dans chaque récit.

Trivia Quiz et Récompenses
Après chaque histoire lue, mettez vos connaissances à l’épreuve avec un _Trivia Quiz_ spécialement conçu. Répondez correctement pour décrocher des récompenses et valoriser vos progrès spirituels.

French Translator Dictionary + by VidaLingua transforms your iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch into an advanced language assistant, always ready to help. It includes features you won’t find in any other app and it’s trusted by millions of users who have given it the highest ratings of any app in its category. 

FEATURES

• Offline Phrase Translator using advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI), augmented by the Human Intelligence (HI) of our linguists, to deliver the best translations of any app.
• Photo Translator. Take a picture and translate any text in the image.
• Voice Translator. Say a phrase in one language and translate it to another.
• Text Translator. Type or copy text and generate accurate translations.
• French English Dictionary with over 753,000 offline entries. Includes numerous translations, usage examples, part-of-speech, images, and gender for French nouns. Compiled and updated by professional linguists.

• Flashcards. Create study lists based on dictionary favorites.

• Apple Watch support with voice lookups so you can say a word and find translations quickly.
• Advanced voice recognition to enter words and phrases hands-free. Useful for practicing pronunciation.
• Helpful dictionary features such as single index search, reverse lookup and sharing entries with friends.

• My Phrases section of phrasebook to add your own translations.

Learn English, Spanish, or French with EWA! Read books with real time translations, discover unknown words with a tap of your finger, complete speaking courses with your favorite TV characters, and learn new words with flashcards - all for free in our app! Improve your existing skills today!

EWA is a personalized English, Spanish, or French tutor that fits in your pocket. Every user can decide for themselves how they would like to learn a language - at what level and at what pace:

1. More than 10,000 English, Spanish, or French books with audio are available for you to sharpen your reading, writing, and grammar skills. Choose a book that matches your current language level and start expanding your skills right away! Unknown word? Simply tap it to translate it, add it to your “to-learn” list, and memorize it forever!

2. Spoken video-courses with popular movie scenes and TV show characters is what our users love the most about EWA! It’s fun, interesting, and an innovative way to improve pronunciation and achieve language proficiency. The courses include a variety of topics, levels and time frames - so, regardless of your current skills, your language abilities will only benefit from EWA!

3. Oxford Topics Dialogues
Don't know what to say at passport control, how to ask for directions or order food at a café? Read and listen to dialogues on everyday topics, developed in collaboration with Oxford Reading University, that will help you in every journey of yours. Thanks to the dialogues, you'll be able to easily improve your conversational English by applying the material you've learned in real life!

4. All you need is a spare 5 minutes a day to learn English, Spanish, or French. More than 40,000 flashcards are available for you to choose from. Pick the words you want to learn and memorize them using the spaced repetition study method. Feeling excited about your progress? Compete on score charts, compare your results to thousands of other people, and get to the top-ranked spot!

5. The games section is now available in EWA.
A unique teaching methodology compromised of cognitive training exercises and easy-to-learn brain games will help you sharpen your language skills in a very fun and exciting way.
Our games aren’t time-wasters; they’re actually great mental stimulators!
Play, have fun, and most importantly, learn a new language in no time!

No more cramming, stress, and angry teachers! With EWA, you’ll learn the language whenever and wherever - at your own pace. You’ll improve your English, Spanish, or French and experience the beauty of knowing another language - from freedom while traveling to higher paying jobs.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated! If you have any concerns, recommendations, or complaints just drop us a line at support@appewa.com and we’ll work towards making EWA better!
